docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Researchers plan to report that they have discovered receptors in the brain that are stimulated by marijuana, suggesting that the body produces a substance similar to marijuana and uses it to relieve pain and stress.

headline.main: Scientists Learn How Marijuana Works in Brain

docs.snippet: LEAD: Researchers plan to report that they have discovered receptors in the brain that are stimulated by marijuana, suggesting that the body produces a substance similar to marijuana and uses it to relieve pain and stress.

byline.original: By PHILIP J. HILTS, Special to The New York Times

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Eli Lilly & Company, Pfizer Inc. and the Upjohn Company said yesterday that they had double-digit gains in profits and sales of drug and health-care products in the three months ended June 30.

headline.main: Three Drug Companies Post Strong Profits

docs.snippet: LEAD: Eli Lilly & Company, Pfizer Inc. and the Upjohn Company said yesterday that they had double-digit gains in profits and sales of drug and health-care products in the three months ended June 30.

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: The MacArthur Foundation of Chicago, widening the range of its coveted annual awards to gifted people, named a juggler, a photographer and a preserver of disappearing varieties of seeds among its 36 winners of fellowships yesterday.
docs.snippet: LEAD: The MacArthur Foundation of Chicago, widening the range of its coveted annual awards to gifted people, named a juggler, a photographer and a preserver of disappearing varieties of seeds among its 36 winners of fellowships yesterday.
